name: originals_episodes_get_info
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool webtoon.
Tool description: This API provides the largest webcomics data in the world to create a comic site/application such as webtoons.com
API description: Get episode and photo links
*To load images, please check the tutorial at https://rapidapi.com/apidojo/api/webtoon/tutorials/how-to-load-images

episodeno.description: The episode number. It corresponds to the `episodeNo` field returned by the `/originals/episodes/list` endpoint.

titleno.description: The title number. It corresponds to the `titleNo` field returned by the `/originals/titles/list` or `/originals/titles/list-by-rank` endpoint.

language.description: The language code for the response. Defaults to 'en'. Accepted values are 'en', 'zh-hant', 'de', 'fr', 'es', 'th', 'id'.
